prefercite.p: Halifax County (Va.) Will Books, 1753-1797. Halifax County (Va.) Reels 36 and 37, Local government records collection, Halifax County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Halifax County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Halifax County was formed in 1752 from Lunenburg County.
The will books of Halifax County (Va.) in this collection were created by the County Court.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Will books, 1753-1797, of Halifax County Court. The will books includes the name of testator, list of heirs and year the wills were proven in court and probate records such as inventories and appraisements.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Halifax County Wills can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Cosult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records On Microfilm" found on the Library of Virginia web site.
